meanings.definition: Actions taken in advance to prevent something dangerous or unpleasant from happening.
meanings.sent1: She always takes precautions before going on a hike to stay safe.
meanings.sent2: It is important to follow precautions to avoid accidents in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel took precautions by hiding its nuts in different places to outsmart the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The old lighthouse stood as a precaution against ships crashing into the rocky shore.
meanings.sent5: Wearing a helmet while biking is a simple but effective precaution to protect your head.

meanings.definition: Measures taken to ensure safety or prevent harm.
meanings.sent1: The lifeguard's precautions helped prevent any accidents at the pool.
meanings.sent2: Before using the power tools, make sure to take necessary precautions.
meanings.sent3: The cat took precautions by sharpening its claws on the scratching post instead of the furniture.
meanings.sent4: The security guard's presence was a visible precaution against potential thieves.
meanings.sent5: Installing smoke detectors in your home is a crucial precaution to alert you in case of a fire.
